name: GitaQuotes
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gita quotes
des:
This Skill gives motivational quotes from bhagavad gita(hindu scripture)

This Skill gives random motivational quotes from bhagavad gita (hindu scripture).
It also gives the user options to repeat the quote to listen again or user can move to next quote.

Quotes taken in this Skill are motivational quotes and not any religion related quotes.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
